sub_title: Commercial Excellence at Booking.com I Yoga Coach
summary: Extensively-travelled and experienced professional with 7+ years in Business Development &  Partnerships in the B2B/B2C travel domain. Grew businesses by > $2M by managing key partners for Travel Tech, Entertainment and Retail businesses. Skilled in partner onboarding, drafting and implementing strategies for partners, managing communication, tracking partner value through commercial KPIs. Worked with a diverse set of businesses like OTAs, hotels, affiliates across EMEA and APAC.

education.degree_name: MSc in Hospitality and Tourism Management

profile_positions.description:
Within one year of its launch, devised a successful content & marketing strategy resulting in engagements > 1M, lead generation of > 50K and an active customer base of 500+

I am an intuitive Yoga and Mindset Coach with a unique teaching style, working towards empowering and inspiring young minds in building mind-body confidence by giving them tools and techniques to enhance quality of life in this fast paced goal-oriented world.

Instagram/FB - @yogawithmalvika
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
At Vayu Retreats, we value conscious living and believe in building a healthier, happier and fulfilling life.

We provide a safe space for people to disconnect and reconnect, and encourage spending time in a healthy environment with lively bunch of individuals from different walks of life.

Besides our lookout for blissful locations, comfortable accommodation, healthy cuisine, unique cultural experiences and undoubtedly the perfect place to practice Yoga, we highly value bonding and encourage new friendships. 

We carefully design Yoga & Wellness retreats to destinations within India and outside to help you move away from the daily hustles of life and take time out to rejuvenate your body, mind & soul.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
I am an extensive traveller having covered 24+ countries and a flourished Travel Experience Designer with ​6.5+ years’ experience in travel design, customer relations and social media.

I create content on various social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, Youtube, and Tripoto:
- One of the top bloggers on Tripoto with 1000+ followers and 12 Million+ Views
- Average engagement includes 15000 likes, 3000 shares and 2500 comments through all platforms
- Nano Influencer on Instagram & Facebook, primarily sharing travel stories via pictures, along with Yoga & Mindset
- Youtube newbie sharing 'How To' content related to travel and wellness
- Over the years, I have worked with brands like High Sierra & Santorini Secret Suites & Spa for Instagram, and collaborated with 5* Perivolas Luxury Suites Santorini gaining 7.6K views on Tripoto

Tripoto: https://bit.ly/Tripoto1
Instagram: https://bit.ly/InstaOnLinkedin
Facebook: https://bit.ly/MalsFacebook
Youtube: https://bit.ly/MalYoutube

I offer the following services to individuals, travel companies & tourism boards, online publications:
- Freelance travel writing services 
- Tour Leader services
- Itinerary Design services
- Travel Booking services
- Consultation for Fully Self Guided Tours

Have worked extensively with travel agents and tourism boards across the world and successfully led more than 10 trips to international destinations. Have a strong network of 200+ reliable agents who offer competitive pricing and quality services.
profile_positions.title: Travel Designer - Leisure (Outbound)

profile_positions.description:
- Successfully devised the entire process for onboarding of new partners: from market research to acquisition to  onboarding, negotiating with the best parameters, and closing the deal
- Collaborated with various teams to resolve challenges by taking up quantitative and qualitative analysis on partner problems, defining solutions, providing recommendations & presenting it to all stakeholders involved
- Identified and built relationships with operators/ DMC's/ Tourism Boards as per business needs
- Negotiated and contracted competitive/best rates in the industry for the experiences provided
- Kept the team updated with the latest news relevant to the industry
- Participated in tourism expos/exhibitions, tourism roadshows & presentations as well as FAMs
- Presented new ideas that exceed customer expectations which make for a best in class experience
- Developed action plans to achieve the set goals like meeting revenues/profits or sales targets
profile_positions.title: Head - Business Development & Operations (Leisure Travel)

profile_positions.description:
The role required owning the end to end vendor management process:
- Identification and selection of suppliers/vendors as per predefined business needs  
- Managing the supplier relationships within the portfolio (existing and new)
- Negotiation of contracts or contract change to ensure that commercial and supplier performance requirements are met.
- Liaising regularly with suppliers and customers to review and improve performance against services provided.
- Help prioritize business opportunities and develop action plans to achieve set goals, by implementing marketing plans involving suppliers/vendors
- Maintain thorough understanding of the industry, seasonality and business trends/events, and continually monitor competitor/industry developments.
- Present new ideas, processes and opportunities that exceed customer expectations and make for a best in class experience.
- Attend vendor training programs regularly to enhance the knowledge of their product offerings.

Metrics for success / KPI's to measure:
- Onboarding of suppliers & products - # of suppliers. # of products
- Revenue generation - $$, $/supplier, $/region
- Minimizing refunds & losses
profile_positions.title: Manager - Business Development & Partnerships

profile_positions.description:
- Strong partnerships with DMCs and OTAs, resulting in competitive pricing, extensive inventory and exclusive privileges
- Worked on analyzing key partner management metrics like product adoption, quality of supply, competitiveness of supply and partner satisfaction

As a budding startup, dabbled in other roles some of which included
- Research, design and execute group travels for multiple segments & destinations
- Do competitor research, understand industry trends, do primary (FAM trips) and secondary research on products
- Introducing new destinations in the market based on extensive research, and optimising sales for the same
- Contracting best rates possible while maintaining robust relations with partners
- Regularly participating in roadshows, tourism expos to expand knowledge of destinations and products which are currently in trend, and building relationships with partners
- Work with the creative and content teams to launch products and participate in the creative process around them
- Participate in the sales process where needed, especially around FITs and step in for group sales calls wherever required
- End to end management of FITs by customising packages for customers and creating interest based tailor-made packages
- Lead trips (FIT & groups) and manage on ground logistics & operations for a best in class experience
